default.title: Coaching agreement essentials
default.intro: Every engagement starts with a plain-language agreement. It protects confidentiality, explains logistics and outlines the commitments we both make.

sections.heading: Confidentiality and ethics
paragraphs: All conversations are confidential unless we explicitly agree to share updates with a sponsor or employer.
We work to the ICF Code of Ethics and will signpost elsewhere if coaching is not the appropriate support.

sections.heading: Scheduling and cadence
paragraphs: Sessions are typically 60 minutes on Zoom. You can reschedule with 24 hours’ notice at no additional cost.
Between sessions you can reach out by email or voice note for quick reflections or accountability.

sections.heading: Fees and invoicing
paragraphs: Invoices are issued at the start of the engagement with 14-day payment terms unless otherwise agreed.
Employer sponsorship is welcomed — we align on confidentiality boundaries before any updates are shared.

sections.heading: Ending or pausing
paragraphs: You can pause or end the engagement at any time. We will close with a short retrospective and note any open commitments.
Unused sessions are refundable unless a discounted cohort or group rate has been applied.

default.footer: You will receive the full agreement to review and sign electronically before our first paid session.

career-return.intro: Return-to-work engagements often involve employers or sponsors. We document what can and cannot be shared before coaching begins.

sections.heading: Re-entry milestones
paragraphs: We agree the milestones you want support with — for example interviews, first 90 days or building advocacy at home.
When sponsors are involved we schedule optional triads to align expectations without compromising confidentiality.

sections.heading: Support alongside work
paragraphs: If your employer is funding the programme we set up a light cadence for progress pulses they can rely on.
You always control what is shared. Sessions remain a confidential space for you to reflect and experiment.

immigrant-job.intro: When immigration questions show up we integrate trusted partners for legal or relocation advice, keeping coaching focused on decision-making and wellbeing.

sections.heading: Coordinating across time zones
paragraphs: We confirm preferred time zones and communication channels before the agreement is signed.
If you travel during the engagement we adapt our schedule so sessions remain supportive.
